REUTERS.UNKNOWN: F f0680 reute d f BC-DELTA-AIR-<DAL>-BEGIN 03-02 0043

TEXT.TITLE: DELTA AIR <DAL> BEGINS ATLANTA-TOKYO SERVICE
TEXT.BODY: Delta Air Lines Inc said it began service from Atlanta to Tokyo today. The carrier will fly single-plane through service departing daily from Atlanta and Tokyo five days a week, it said. Reuter
